82372.affected_area: Winnipeg (East Elmwood, Kildonan crossing and Peguis)
82372.summary: Some customers in the East Elmwood, Kildonan crossing and Peguis areas of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
82372.title: Aug 23 - Winnipeg (East Elmwood, Kildonan crossing and Peguis) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
